mapper.select: SELECT A.id, A.title, A.price, A.market_price, A.types, A.state, A.degree, A.volume, concat(B.file_location, '/', file_name) AS img FROM goods A LEFT JOIN upload_file B on A.id=B.owner_id WHERE A.state=#{state} AND B.owner_type=1 AND B.mark='s'
